snippet: In this short documentary film, Katherine Boone, 18, and her family talk about what it’s been like as Kat has transitioned from being a biological male into a female.
abstract: In this short documentary film, Katherine Boone, 18, and her family talk about what it’s been like as Kat has transitioned from being a biological male into a female.

headline.main: Film Club | Rebirth of a Transgender Teenager
